Articles.Content:
I made another X-29 replica, this time with parts of v1.0. 

![AJrUoEE.png](http://i.imgur.com/AJrUoEE.png)

![ZpAAcXD.png](http://i.imgur.com/ZpAAcXD.png)

![sqqd0Nf.png](http://i.imgur.com/sqqd0Nf.png)

![hwj3H93.png](http://i.imgur.com/hwj3H93.png)

![1NzBaCH.png](http://i.imgur.com/1NzBaCH.png)

![4KrZRZ9.png](http://i.imgur.com/4KrZRZ9.png)

Mod used: Adjustable Landing Gear

Craft file:

[http://www./download/7t1pkbc7n61jywa/Grumman_X-29(2).craft](http://www./download/7t1pkbc7n61jywa/Grumman_X-29%282%29.craft)

X-plane over load 

 i like this ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)

Well, I was beat to posting an X - 29. Your plane is a lot more accurate. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

Nice job. Looks like the real thing, and those wings are dead-on.

[Here](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/125862-NEW-Beta-Core-Industries-Kerbal-Imitations-and-Original-Craft) is my version.
